alert.note: Alert for Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 2:45PM CDT until April 04 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Walworth County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 245 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near East Troy, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... East Troy, Potter Lake, and Troy Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
